AvoidAssertAsIdentifier.description:
Description

Maximum Language Version:Java 1.3

Use of the termassertwill conflict with newer versions of Java since it is a reserved word.

Since Java 1.4, the tokenassertbecame a reserved word and using it as an identifier will
result in a compilation failure for Java 1.4 and later. This rule is therefore only useful
for old Java code before Java 1.4. It can be used to identify problematic code prior to a Java update.

Example(s):

Use this rule by referencing it:
AvoidAssertAsIdentifier.option: This rule has no specific options.
